instance.name: Novice Mahjong (Ranked)
instance.description:
The ancient Doman game of mahjong joins the entertainment on offer at the Gold Saucer. Practice against automata, and hone your strategies to triumph in this contest of wits!

※Allows the tanyao yaku to be used after calling pon or chi.
※Your rating and rank may rise or fall depending on your final placement.
※To check your rating and rank, select Character in the main menu, followed by Gold Saucer, then Mahjong.

obj.n: Every Little Thing She Does Is Mahjong
